alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 4:16AM EST until February 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting from 40 mph to as high as 50 mph tonight. * WHERE...Northern Houghton and Keweenaw Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility tonight. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause a few power outages. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero tonight could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is the potential for near blizzard conditions tonight. Travelers should remain vigilant for future forecasts and plan on extra time to reach their destination or consider adjusting their travel plans.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
